price: 44. a menos que Nos apiadásemos de ellos para dejarlos disfrutar (de la vida) por un tiempo.
arabic: إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنَّا وَمَتَٰعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: illā raḥmatan minnā wamatāʿan ilā ḥīnin
